metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3773 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw in netfilter could allow a network-connected attacker to infer openvpn connection endpoint information for further use in traditional network attacks.

notes.Note: sbeattie> no identified fix in the upstream kernel as of 2022-01-27

criterions.comment: linux package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
